text:
Abit stands for Agricultural
Biodiversity and Technologies.

Abitâ€™s mission is building
a fully sustainable

agriculture through an AI
prediction system.

We are mainly focused on soil
biodiversity and soil health.
What we do is to develop

an innovative software
that measures and implements

soil biodiversity and soil quality
through an AI prediction system.
We chose AWS because AWS gives

us the opportunity
to go faster to market,

an easy way to start,
but to be prepared for growth.

In Abit we are fully on AWS,
so we use a lot of services.

On AWS, we are currently
developing our software

and we are currently
developing our algorithm.
We use Amazon SageMaker services

to develop our AI system
and our algorithm.

AWS plays a crucial role
in our generative AI

strategy because AWS
gives us the opportunity

to have always
the latest technology

and to implement
this technology
in our software.
